---
title: "Visualization 1"
subtitle: "Creating more effective charts"
---

We demonstrate the perceptual limitations of common graph types and suggest more effective alternatives. 

![](figures/stacked-bar-preview.png){width=70%}


Our goals in visual rhetoric are  
  
- Improving **perception** of stories in the data
- Facilitating quantitative **reasoning** about the data
- Enhancing **credibility** of evidence supporting an argument
